Kostum Ikonik Olivia Newton-John di 'Grease' Laku Rp5,6 M
05 Nov 2019, 08:44 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Olivia Newton-John meraup popularitas tinggi lewat film musikal 'Grease'. (dok. Robyn Beck / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Jaket kulit warna hitam dan celana ketat yang pernah dikenakan aktris dan penyanyi Olivia Newton-John dalam film legendaris 'Grease' diberitakan telah menghasilkan US$405,700 atau sekitar Rp5,6 miliar.Olivia Newton-John mengenakan kostum ikonik tersebut saat menampilkan lagu 'You're the One That I Want' bersama John Travolta. Baru-baru ini, sang aktris melelang memorabilia film dan video untuk menggalang dana bagi yayasan miliknya, Olivia Newton-John Cancer Research Institute di Australia.Turut dilelang pula, naskah asli film Grease milik Olivia. Keseluruhan lelang memorabilia yang dilakukan oleh Rumah Lelang Julien di Beverly Hills, California itu mendapatkan US$2,4 juta.Banyak barang-barang Olivia yang berhasil dilelang dengan harga berkali lipat, bahkan di luar perkiraan. Misalnya seperti gaun bergaya tahun 1950-an warna merah muda yang ia kenakan di penayangan perdana Grease di Los Angeles pada 1978, terjual seharga US$18,750 atau sekitar Rp262 juta.Mengutip Ace Showbiz, Olivia meminta para pemilik baru untuk mengiriminya foto-foto mereka bersama barang-barang yang didapat saat pelelangan.Setelah melihat supermodel Gigi Hadid berpenampilan ala karakter Sandy yang ia perankan dalam Grease saat Halloween, Olivia mengungkapkan ia berusaha menghubungi Gigi, membujuknya untuk turut mengajukan penawaran saat lelang.


Olivia Newton-John mengenakan kostum ketat nan ikonik serba hitam dalam 'Grease'. (dok. Paramount Pictures)

"Saya melihat foto Gigi Hadid, salah satu gadis tercantik, dan dia memakai pakaian saya," kata Olivia.Ia melanjutkan, "Jadi saya mengiriminya pesan. Saya bilang, 'Gigi, belilah yang asli. Kau bisa mendapatkannya di pelelangan!'."Olivia Newton-John diketahui tengah berjuang melawan kanker payudara stadium empat. Sebelum ini, ia pernah dua kali didiagnosa sakit yang sama, yakni pada 1992 dan 2013. Grease adalah film klasik AS yang rilis pada 1978 dengan John Travolta dan Olivia Newton-John sebagai bintang. Drama percintaan musikal yang bercerita tentang hubungan Danny Zuko dan Sandy Olsson itu meraih sukses besar dengan lagu-lagu yang hari ini juga dianggap ikonik seperti You're the One That I Want serta Summer Nights. (rea)

Olivia Newton-John's Iconic Costume in 'Grease' Sells IDR5.6 Billion
05 Nov 2019, 08:44 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Olivia Newton-John gained high popularity through the musical film 'Grease'. (doc. Robyn Beck / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Black leather jacket and tight pants worn by actress and singer Olivia Newton-John in the legendary film 'Grease' reportedly generated US $ 405,700 or around Rp5.6 billion. Olivia Newton-John wore the iconic costume when featuring the song 'You're the One That I Want' with John Travolta. Recently, the actress auctioned film and video memorabilia to raise funds for her foundation, Olivia Newton-John Cancer Research Institute in Australia. Also according to the auction, Olivia's original Grease script. The entire memorabilia auction conducted by the Julien Auction House in Beverly Hills, California received US $ 2.4 million. Many Olivia items were successfully auctioned at many times, even unexpected prices. For example, like the 1950s-style pink dress that she wore at the premiere of Grease in Los Angeles in 1978, sold for US $ 18,750. Citing Ace Showbiz, Olivia asked new owners to send her photos of them with goods items that were obtained during the auction. After seeing the supermodel Gigi Hadid who looked like the Sandy character he played in Grease on Halloween, Olivia revealed that he was trying to contact Gigi, persuading him to take part in bidding at the auction.


Olivia Newton-John wears an iconic all-black, strict costume in 'Grease'. (doc. Paramount Pictures)

"I saw a photo of Gigi Hadid, one of the prettiest girls, and she was wearing my clothes," Olivia said. She continued, "So I sent him a message. I said, 'Gigi, buy the real one. You can get it at auction!' Olivia Newton-John is known to be battling stage four breast cancer. Prior to this, he was diagnosed with the same illness twice, namely in 1992 and 2013. Grease is a US classic film released in 1978 with John Travolta and Olivia Newton-John as stars. The musical romance drama that tells the story of Danny Zuko and Sandy Olsson's relationship was a huge success with songs that today are also considered iconic such as You're the One That I Want and Summer Nights. (rea)
